name: Kafkoff
description: Kafkoff represents a unique fusion of bar, gallery, and lounge situated in the historic birthplace of Franz Kafka, mere steps from Old Town Square. This versatile venue provides an atmospheric setting for corporate gatherings, product presentations, and celebrations. The space combines cultural heritage with modern functionality, making it ideal for events that seek to blend Prague's literary history with contemporary sophistication.

name: Space Cafe & Events Karlín
description: An inspiring venue that brings together cutting-edge design, specialty coffee culture, and professional event infrastructure. Space Cafe & Events Karlín offers a contemporary setting perfect for business meetings, workshops, and corporate events. The space features industrial-style architecture combined with modern amenities, creating an environment that stimulates creativity and productive collaboration.

name: Bar Monk Prague
description: A contemporary cocktail destination nestled in the heart of Prague's historic center. Bar Monk offers an intimate yet sophisticated atmosphere perfect for corporate celebrations and special events. Located in the charming Malá Strana district, just moments from the iconic Charles Bridge, this venue combines modern mixology with Old World charm, creating memorable experiences for gatherings of up to 50 guests.

name: Boutique Hotel Jalta
description: An architectural masterpiece from the post-war socialist realism era, Boutique Hotel Jalta seamlessly bridges past and present. This distinguished venue, located on Wenceslas Square, is renowned for its extraordinary history, character, and distinctive design. With capacity for up to 150 seated guests, it provides an exceptional setting for conferences, large corporate events, and prestigious gatherings that benefit from its unique historical atmosphere and central Prague location.

name: Prime House Karlín
description: Prime House Karlín presents a multifunctional space designed with an inspiring environment for smaller corporate events and business meetings. The venue masterfully combines industrial architectural elements with artistic detailing and flexible layout options, creating a distinctive atmosphere. Equipped with modern meeting rooms, large-format TV screens, HDMI connectivity, and comprehensive presentation and audio technology, it serves as an ideal location for companies seeking a creative yet professional setting.

name: Salabka
description: Experience the essence of Provence in the heart of Prague at this remarkable vineyard restaurant and winery. Salabka uniquely combines modern design, exceptional gastronomy, and wines from its own vineyard, all set in the picturesque Troja neighborhood. With capacity for 50 seated or 180 standing guests, this venue transforms ordinary meetings into unforgettable experiences. The wheelchair-accessible space offers panoramic views, making it perfect for sophisticated corporate events, wine tastings, and celebrations that demand an extraordinary setting.

name: Kulinární studio MAFRA
description: TasteLAB stands as a premier culinary studio located in central Prague, featuring two fully-equipped professional kitchens that can function independently or combine into one expansive workspace. The venue includes a generous 70-square-meter outdoor terrace, making it exceptionally versatile for team building activities, conferences, product launches, and hands-on cooking classes. With complete dining service for 30 people and modern amenities including climate control and large-format mobile screens, this space caters to both culinary and corporate needs.

name: Dancing House Hotel
description: The iconic Dancing House Hotel offers stylish conference spaces with modern equipment, providing exceptional settings for business meetings, seminars, and corporate events. This architecturally renowned venue features multiple conference rooms with unique panoramic views and flexible seating arrangements accommodating up to 120 guests. The combination of the building's distinctive design, wheelchair accessibility, and comprehensive technical amenities creates an impressive backdrop for events that aim to leave a lasting impression.

name: Alforno Pizza & Pasta
description: Alforno Pizza & Pasta merges historical charm with authentic Italian cuisine in a building dating back to 1412. The dedicated culinary team prepares traditional dishes from various Italian regions using fresh seasonal ingredients, homemade pasta, and authentic Roman-style pizza. With seating for 84 guests across multiple floors and a garden area, this restaurant offers a warm, welcoming atmosphere perfect for private dining events, celebrations, and corporate gatherings seeking an authentic taste of Italy in Prague's historic center.
